snippet: The episodes, including cases of rape against young male recruits, date back to the 1950s, and has prompted Prime Minister Julia Gillard to raise the possibility of a high-level public inquiry.
lead_paragraph: The episodes, including cases of rape against young male recruits, date back to the 1950s, and has prompted Prime Minister Julia Gillard to raise the possibility of a high-level public inquiry.

headline.seo: Report Details History of Abuse in Australian Military
